p: HPLC determination of glucose, fructose, xylose, galactose, rhamnose, sucrose and cellobiose was performed on Agilent 1220 HPLC system (Agilent Technology, USA), equipped with binary pump and Refractive Index Detector. Separation was performed using Aminex HPX-87H column (300 mm × 7.8 mm, BioRad), eluent 4 mM H 2SO 4, flow 0.5 mL/min, temperature 25 °C. Results are expressed as mg/100 g dry weight.
